plot outline: Set in small town Karnataka, the story revolves around the love between Raju, a photocopy store assistant, and Bhagya, who works at the local cable TV office. The two dream of a happily ever after. But, can they achieve it, given their limited means?
title: Bhagyaraj
plot: Set in small town Karnataka, the story revolves around the love between Raju, a photocopy store assistant, and Bhagya, who works at the local cable TV office. The two dream of a happily ever after. But, can they achieve it, given their limited means?

In a small town in Karnataka, life is seemingly simple and straightforward. However, when a man who works as a store assistant, falls in love with a woman working in the cable TV office, their love story is anything but simple. How will they face the dangers along their path?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
